thread.title: Adventure Tasmania Relaunches For 2015/2016 Tourist Season
thread.title_full: Adventure Tasmania Relaunches For 2015/2016 Tourist Season

title: Adventure Tasmania Relaunches For 2015/2016 Tourist Season
text: Adventure Tasmania Relaunches For 2015/2016 Tourist Season , 16 September 2015 -- Adventure Tasmania is a website dedicated to promoting tourism and travel in Tasmania with a focus on outdoor activities and experiences.Adventure Tasmania is a website dedicated to promoting tourism and travel in Tasmania with a focus on outdoor activities and experiences. In September Adventure Tasmania has been relaunched with a new website built from the ground up to facilitate online bookings. The site now features a larger selection of tours and attractions as well as accommodation (over 1500 rooms statewide) which can be booked directly with the operator through the website. The Adventure Tasmania website and social media presence launched in 2013 with a blog and a small selection of product listings. Adventure Tasmania has grown to now feature over 250 local tourism businesses including accommodation providers and tour companies. Adventure Tasmania has over 24,000 followers on social media and regularly creates video content showcasing the best events and local tourism experiences. "Adventure Tasmania has been a fantastic development for the Adventure Tourism industry in Tasmania. It is generating a lot of interest and getting the message out there that Tassie is a fantastic destination for adventure lovers. Now that Adventure Tasmania is moving into the role of selling tours, we are expecting to see a boost to business. We are very excited that Adventure Tasmania generated bookings within two days of launching the new website." - Anthony O’Hern - Cradle Mountain Canyons Owner“I see Adventure Tasmania providing targeted content for the growing adventure tourism market here in Tasmania. Though largely untapped, the potential to promote this state as the country's adventure capital is exciting. It's also an opportunity for adventure operators to work as a collective.” - Alice Hansen, Tasmanian Travel Writer, Tailored Tasmania Images and Video can be provided upon request Further Information: Dale Baldwin - Adventure Tasmania Owner 0408059221
